review: Jared came highly recommended to me and he proved everything I was told. He helped me through a very stressful situation, provided me with excellent legal advice above and beyond, and made himself available to me at all times everything you would want in a lawyer. I would not hesitate to recommend him to anyone who needs a top-notch lawyer and a good human!
